summary: A ten-years-later continuation of Hal Hartley's "Henry Fool", where Fay Grim (Posey) is coerced by a CIA agent (Goldblum) to try and locate notebooks that belonged to her fugitive ex-husband (Ryan). Published in them is information that could compromises the security of the U.S., causing Fay to first head to Paris to fetch them ...
cast: Parker Posey|D.J. Mendel|Liam Aiken|Megan Gay|Jasmin Tabatabai|Chuck Montgomery|James Urbaniak|John Keogh|Claudia Michelsen|Jeff Goldblum|Leo Fitzpatrick|J.E. title: Fay Grim
